item.title: About smaakagen
item.description: smaakagen is an infamous data science prodigy currently working at the Danish tax authority with applications of extremely complicated algorithms on very tiny data sets.

item.title: 'modelgrid' - a framework for creating, managing and training multiple models
item.description: modelgrid is a new package of mine, which has just made its way on to CRAN. modelgrid offers a minimalistic but very flexible framework to create, manage and train a portfolio of caret models. Note, you should already be fairly familiar with the caret package before giving modelgrid a spin. Below I describe the key concept behind modelgrid as well as the features of modelgrid divided into three main categories:
